recommendations: Karumbaiah BK “Shail started working with me right after he completed his undergrad course and I was pleasantly surprised by his problem solving and entrepreneurial capabilities. He has a great ability to bring in critical thoughts and perspectives to the discussion table and always adds a lot of value to the decision making process. Breaking down a problem and strategically tackling it with limited resources is something that naturally comes to him. I had a wonderful and enriching time working with him.”

Nikunj Thakkar “I have rarely come across freshers with a clarity of thought, ambition and dedication to grow in the Venture Capital space. Shail certainly is one of them. During his two month stint in the Investment team of Artha Venture Fund, he had put in lot of hard work for timely delivering the tasks assigned to him. He displayed a positive outlook and curiosity towards new business models and sectors, which made him a good resource to have at work. Overall, I would recommend him for his positive attitude and ability to be a fast learner.”

volunteer_experience.info:
Fascinated with the world of startups in my first year of college - joined E-Cell IIT KGP, one of the oldest student entrepreneurship promoting bodies in India. Little did I know that I had signed up for an amazing networking experience, loads of hustle and a lifetime of friendships :)Became the lead coordinator in my third year - launched new initiatives for KGP Alumni startups and revamped the conventional initiatives to effectively deliver value to aspiring entrepreneurs in the IIT…

          Fascinated with the world of startups in my first year of college - joined E-Cell IIT KGP, one of the oldest student entrepreneurship promoting bodies in India. Little did I know that I had signed up for an amazing networking experience, loads of hustle and a lifetime of friendships :)Became the lead coordinator in my third year - launched new initiatives for KGP Alumni startups and revamped the conventional initiatives to effectively deliver value to aspiring entrepreneurs in the IIT Kharagpur campus.

volunteer_experience.title: Member, Coordinator & Advisor

volunteer_experience.info: Tech folks in the IIT Kharagpur campus were obsessed with Google Summer of Code. So we started our own "Kharagpur Winter of Code"! It saw a total participation of more than 900 students & professionals, 50 students with at-least one commit & more than 100 mentors for 50+ projects.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Kharagpur Open Source Society
volunteer_experience.title: Events Guy

volunteer_experience.info: I've always loved writing & storytelling - this was an attempt to convert this passion into something meaningful for my alma mater.
